hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: You would be surprised at all the things you can Hookshot in the Spirit Temple!

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #0# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Hookshot# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Remember that time you did that really embarrassing thing?^${12 68 3A}Yikes.
